price: A la òun àti àwọn tó wà pẹ̀lú rẹ̀ nínú ọkọ̀ ojú-omi tó kún kẹ́kẹ́.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
